content:
Board of Trustees Chairwoman Karen Peetz speaks briefly with President Rodney Erickson after the conclusion of the public meeting held on August   in the Penn Stater Conference Hotel PERIOD

Penn State Board of Trustees member Karen Peetz announced her intent to resign on Friday cutting short an eventful nearlyfiveyearlong tenure PERIOD

She was a member of the board in November  when it fired late fooball coach Joe Paterno and former president Graham Spanier in the wake of the Jerry Sandusky child sex abuse case PERIOD

Peetzs resignation will become effective Jan PERIOD  PERIOD Her position as chair of the Committee on Audit and Risk will be filled by former trustee Ira Lubert beginning Jan PERIOD  according to a press release PERIOD

Following the boards bylaws board chairman Keith Masser appointed Lubert for this unexpected term according to the release PERIOD

We owe Karen Peetz a great debt of gratitude for her service and her counselWhile not a longstanding member of the Board Karen stepped up at great personal sacrifice when the university needed strong leadership PERIOD She not only oversaw a number of actions that strengthened our institution for the future but also served as chair of our presidential selection council that brought us Dr PERIOD Barron.conflicting demands of her business commitments and travel with the boards meeting schedule. she is the president of BNY Mellon and has served as a trustee since  according to the release PERIOD

The board is schedule to meet Jan PERIOD  for its general meeting PERIOD
